Police do need more training dealing with these situations, they aren't, after all, psychiatrists or psychologists. Who knows what triggered the man or if another approach would have helped as some neighbors stated. Sad for someone to lose their mind and 2 lives. Mental health needs more attention and funding for sure. And laws need to change for the families to be able to help their families faster and for the long run. When will enough lives lost to mental illness matter and push for change?
